trans-unit.source: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示由两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象的组合定义的二维几何形状。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>属性指定组合两个几何图形的方式。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>将合并指定两个几何图形，因此没有区域的几何图形的区域 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) 结合使用时消失。

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过多种方式组合几何图形： 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>从一个或多个创建的复合几何图形<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>使用指定的布尔操作以组合两个所描述的区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> object.
trans-unit.target: 静态<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>类，其行为与相同的方式在<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>对象。

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: 使用时，应涉及认真考虑<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>将更好地工作。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> only when any of the following apply:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>仅当时任何适用以下原则：

trans-unit.source: The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: 几何操作不是联合。

trans-unit.source: Either of the geometries have a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule.EvenOdd> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: 有两种： 几何图形<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule.EvenOdd>自交，几何图形并且 (即<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>实际很重要)。

trans-unit.source: Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果该几何图形是创建一次，然后缓存）。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>生成的输出小于<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: 将描边所生成的几何图形，或将其用于路径动画和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>不提供所需的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The method by which <c>geometry1</c> and <c>geometry2</c> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 组合 <c>geometry1</c> 和 <c>geometry2</c> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The method by which <c>geometry1</c> and <c>geometry2</c> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 组合 <c>geometry1</c> 和 <c>geometry2</c> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" /> applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，它指定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象的边界框。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法不考虑任何钢笔。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 的边界框。

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在动画的基值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象用于计算边界框。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>属性指定组合两个几何图形的方式。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>将合并指定两个几何图形，因此没有区域的几何图形的区域 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) 结合使用时消失。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>属性指定组合两个几何图形的方式。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>将合并指定两个几何图形，因此没有区域的几何图形的区域 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) 结合使用时消失。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method by which the two geometries (specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> properties) are combined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组合两个几何图形（由<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> 属性指定）的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method by which <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 组合 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode.Union" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode.Union" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: 计算的容错。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 指定解释容错的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region.
trans-unit.target: 获取已填充区域的面积。

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this combined geometry.
trans-unit.target: 此组合几何图形的填充区域的面积。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象是否为空。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 为空，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象是否可以具有曲线段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> 对象可以具有曲线段，则为 true；否则为 false。
